The subject allocate ( 1 ) negative-control group : oral hygiene instruction ( OHI ) alone ; ( 2 ) positive-control group : OHI plus EO mouthrinse ( ListerineÂ® ) ( 3 ) test group : OHI plus TCM mouthrinse ( 5 % Fructus mume extract ) . Clinical examination include Plaque Index ( PI ) , Bleeding Index ( BI ) Modified Gingival Index ( MGI ) . Salivary microbial quantification include total aerobic anaerobic bacteria , Streptococci Lactobacilli count . Clinical microbiological examination conduct baseline , 3 6 month ( T1 , T2 T3 ) .
